title: Structure Steering Document
response:
Feedback Summary (2 comments):

General Comments:
1. rename the folder from gp_ota_tester to something more meaningful, catchy and professional
2. server configuration should incorporate database to store configuration and all data related operations. this could user sqlite3 or mysql or postgresql
